_sText:
Here a small walkthrough video:
What changed compared to Beta 1?
-improved performance through beginning optimization
-a lot of re-texturing
-several custom blends to improve the atmosphere
-custom models to achieve realism
-custom decals with German World War 2 propaganda posters
-cubemaps
-way more detailed house
-the speech that was delivered by Goebbels in the Sportpalast in 1943
-way better 3d Skybox
-more details in general
Sorry for the big size. For the final release I will scale down the custom decals, in this version I still was carefull cause I did not want to make them too small. Please give me honest and constructive feedback _after_ you looked at the map ingame. Please do not judge just by viewing the screenshots. If you want to use the custom decals or models please ask before ripping them out of the bsp-file. Kind regards
Schnittbrot
